review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you work through a past mistake, self-criticism, or other way you have been hard
            on yourself? Does it help you feel better supported and grounded? See you on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Developing solid ground underneath you and learning to trust yourself (Pillars #1, & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
â€œWell done is better than well said\" Benjamin FranklinEvery day there are numerous opportunities to learn, grow and heal. One of your most important lessons is
            discovering that you can trust yourself. You can learn this lesson when you say you are going to do
            something, and then follow through. You can also learn this lesson that when you do something, you hold the
            intention to do it well.

action_step:
What action can you commit to and follow through with today? At the same time, can you hold the intention of
            doing this step well? By making a commitment, following through and doing it well, you are developing trust
            in yourself. This supports a more solid ground underneath you.
journal_entry: Write about your trust in yourself.
